subtitle.Text: One of the most comforting things in the world to me is having somebody brush my hair, or stroke my head,
like my mom when I wasn’t feeling well, I could lie down in her lap, and she’d just brush my hair, and it’d always make me feel better.

In like the weirdest way. I couldn’t figure out why, but it just seemed like this friendly… connection, to somebody… that, it is like she says. It is strangely intimate in a way that I’d not really I guess put into words until reading that part of the script.
Where that’s what I was thinking of, was like, that connection. That sort of… human touch. That’s something so friendly, and so loving that you can do,
and that that whole idea of like touching someone’s scalp being so intimate, it made me think of that. Just those wonderful little moments where just a touch can be so much… more.
